Text:
...Well then, please proceed with the supplementary
budget proposal as is. We'll present it to the teachers
during our next meeting with the Academy.

That concludes today's meeting. Thank you everyone
for your hard work!
Um... Rose, may I have a moment?
Yes? Is there something else you need to discuss?
No, it's not related to the meeting, but...

Your performance at the commemoration ceremony the
other day was incredible! It made me want to dance
along!
Heheh. Is that so? Well, I'm glad you enjoyed it.

Totally! I'd love to see you perform again if there's
another opportunity! I just wanted to tell you that...
Well, I'll see myself out
Yes, thank you for your hard work.

...I would like to perform again if there's another
chance.

(It's been a few days since my performance...
I still can't get over how I exciting it was...)

(But right now, I'm the student president. I've got
to separate myself from who I was that day)

...I should be allowed to bask in the afterglow a
little longer, shouldn't I?

Putting it on again...is a bit embarrassing, but I
feel like I can vaguely recall that day...
Thinking about Cid and my performance—
(My steps are finally syncing with Alexia's.)

(If we keep this up, I'm sure we can put on a great
performance. I hope Cid thinks so as well—)
Hmm...

Hey... You look like you've got something on your
mind. What's the matter?
Ah, well... It's about your performance just now.

Please don't hold back. Is there something lacking
in my performance?

Well... I think your smile when you're singing and
dancing is a bit lacking.
My smile...?

It seems a bit stiff. I wish you'd smile like you're
having fun...

After all, idols exist to make everyone smile.
I think it's important that you're smiling first.

I see... I hadn't really thought of that. How can I
improve?
Hmm... Maybe think of something fun?
Something fun...?
(My idea of fun is...)
(What if I said...this very moment?)

(There's nothing I enjoy more than spending time
with Cid, although I may have been taking him for
granted recently...)

(Heheh. Oh no, I'm getting distracted when I'm
supposed to be practicing—)
That's it. That smile of yours just now!
W-Was I smiling that much?

Yes, that was perfect! Think of the same thing
during your actual performance!

Alright, I'll think of you during my performance
and show my best smile!
Err, okay...?
Heheh...
(That advice helped me really enjoy my performance.)
All of this is thanks to Cid...!
...What did Pooch, I mean, Cid do?
Alexia?! W-Were you watching me all this time...?!
...Sorry. But I did knock.

You looked like you were having fun, so I've been
observing you all this time, but you were totally
oblivious.
U-Uhh...! P-Please keep this...between the two of us!

And so, a new embarrassing memory was created in
relation to Rose's idol costume...
